forumNotes.content:
hi,  

I created in French documentation for the creation of a dvd Winbuilder VistaPe containing Gparted, Ubcd, SystemRescueCd, Puppy  
available at [http://webjerome.123.fr](http://webjerome.123.fr "External link")  
thank you for your help

forumNotes.author: Brito
forumNotes.content:
Hi r140,  

Thanks for taking the time to write your experience with multibooting.  

Since it's written in French, I'd also recommend writing a message at this boot disk community: [http://bootwork.free.fr](http://bootwork.free.fr "External link")  

![:cheers:](http://reboot.pro/public/style_emoticons/default/cheers.gif)

forumNotes.author: was_jaclaz
forumNotes.content:
I find queer enough ![:cheers:](http://reboot.pro/public/style_emoticons/default/cheers.gif) that the Author is keen to assert paternity to the document:  
> Vous pouvez utiliser ce document et le modifier librement tant que vous m'enlever pas de la liste des contributeurs (webjerome, [http://webjerome.123.fr)](http://webjerome.123.fr) "External link")

And "gets away" :wink: with:  

> Credits=with help forum boot-land...
> Credits=with help www.boot-land.net
> Credits=Avec l'aide du forum www.boot-land.net

Without any actual reference to where the procedure was "troubleshooted" and by *whom* ![:cheers:](http://reboot.pro/public/style_emoticons/default/cheers.gif):  
[http://www.boot-land...?...ic=6523\&hl=](http://www.boot-land.net/forums/index.php?showtopic=6523&hl= "External link")  
[http://www.boot-land...?...ic=6468\&hl=](http://www.boot-land.net/forums/index.php?showtopic=6468&hl= "External link")  

I guess that I should be cited as the "main" (and only) contributor, otherwise it could end in a Copyright infringement suit....![:cheers:](http://reboot.pro/public/style_emoticons/default/cheers.gif)  

If the above appears fair enough, I additionally ask for it being released explicitly with my CAREWARE license:  
[http://home.graffiti...t/careware.html](http://home.graffiti.net/jaclaz:graffiti.net/careware.html "External link")  

@r140  
Don't worry, the License explicitly provides to do whatever you wish with my things without ANY need whatsoever to cite me...![:cheers:](http://reboot.pro/public/style_emoticons/default/cheers.gif)  

...just joking.... ![:cheers:](http://reboot.pro/public/style_emoticons/default/cheers.gif)   

jaclaz
